thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 03 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Appian Corp Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.16

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Appian Corp Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.16
text:
May 3 (Reuters) - Appian Corp:
* APPIAN ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.12
* Q1 REVENUE $51.7 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $46 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.18 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* TOTAL REVENUE IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $50.2 MILLION AND $50.4 MILLION IN Q2
* NON-GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $0.18 AND $0.17 IN Q2
* TOTAL REVENUE IS NOW EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $202.0 MILLION AND $205.0 MILLION IN 2018
* NON-GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE IS NOW EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $0.64 AND $0.61 IN 2018 Source text for Eikon:
Our
